meta.title: PushShare - Push Notification Sharing Service
meta.description: PushShare - Easily share push notifications across multiple devices

hero.title: Easily share push notifications across multiple devices
hero.subtitle: PushShare is a convenient service that allows you to send notifications received on multiple devices to other devices.

multiDevice.title: Multi-Device Support
multiDevice.description: Register and manage multiple devices to share notifications from anywhere.

realtime.title: Real-time Notification Delivery
realtime.description: Instantly send received notifications to other devices so you never miss important messages.

secure.title: Secure Authentication
secure.description: Safely manage your account and protect your data through Firebase authentication.

multilang.title: Multi-language Support
multilang.description: Supporting over 20 languages to serve users worldwide.

download.title: Download Now
download.subtitle: Download PushShare and start sharing notifications across multiple devices.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact us.
